directions: Divide spinach between 2 serving plates. Arrange half of the cantaloupe and half of the avocado in a circular pattern over the spinach on each plate. Sprinkle with diced red pepper and fresh mint.
Mix together the mint jelly, white wine vinegar, oil and garlic. Drizzle over the salads. Serve.
title: Spinach Cantaloupe Salad with Mint
